Module kivakit.internal.testing
Package com.telenav.kivakit.internal.testing

Class CoreUnitTest

java.lang.Object
org.junit.rules.TestWatcher
com.telenav.kivakit.internal.testing.CoreUnitTest
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.telenav.kivakit.core.ensure.EnsureTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.core.function.ResultTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.core.language.trait.LanguageTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Broadcaster, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Listener, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.MessageTransceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Repeater, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.repeaters.RepeaterMixin, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Transceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.core.project.ProjectTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.core.registry.RegistryTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.core.vm.JavaTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Receiver, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Transmitter, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.Nameable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.NamedObject, com.telenav.kivakit.mixins.Mixin, org.junit.rules.TestRule
public abstract class CoreUnitTest extends org.junit.rules.TestWatcher implements com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.repeaters.RepeaterMixin, com.telenav.kivakit.core.function.ResultTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.core.vm.JavaTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.core.project.ProjectTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.core.ensure.EnsureTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.core.registry.RegistryTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.core.language.trait.LanguageTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Repeater, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.NamedObject
This is the base class for all unit tests. It provides useful methods that are common to all tests. Several ensure*() methods delegate to the Ensure class to provide easy access to these methods.

Random Value Testing

The method random() retrieves a RandomValueFactory for the test, which can be specialized by overriding newRandomValueFactory(). Methods in RandomValueFactory provide support for random value testing. In the event that a randomized test fails the seed number to reproduce the test will be output: 

 // random().seed(123456789L);

To reproduce the test, insert this code at the start of the test method that failed.

Quick Tests

If the system property "testQuick" is set to "true", only unit tests that override isQuickTest() to return true will be executed. Alternatively, quick tests can be labeled with the QuickTest annotation.
